name: Sleep Tight (itch)
description:
Are you ready to face your worst childhood nightmare? Only thing you have on your side is your sling and your snail shell collection.


Sleep Tight is a top-down shooter game where you try to survive as a child with sling using snail shells as ammo against monsters crawling under beds. There are pick-up items, attack, defense, speed and ammo stats that you can enhance.

Controls
W, A, S, D = Movement
Left Mouse Button = Shoot
Hold Right Mouse Button = Rotate camera
E = Pick up item
1, 2, 3, 4, 5 = Inventory hotkeys
TAB = Online players
C = Instructions

Development Team
- Anil Demir (Animations, Interface, Effects)
- Jan Szczepanik-Dzikowski (Programming)
- Kuba Samplawski (Music)
- Polgar (3D Modeling, Environment)
- Urszula Samplawska (Concept Art, Textures)

Please let us know about your opinions and bugs since we would like to work further on this game in the future.

Have fun!

WARNING
After you die, you have to restart the executable to play again. Otherwise game may get broken.

This game is made for Ludum Dare 32 in 3 days. Click here to see the entry.
